Headline: #111A Pullman Shuttle, #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Northbound Reroute near King Drive/115th
ShortDescription: NB 111A Pullman Shuttle, 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Front, 114th and King Drive: due to, street blockage near King Drive/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #111A Pullman Shuttle, 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Front, 114th and King Drive: due to, street blockage near King Drive/115th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near 115th/Spaulding
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: #66 buses are temporarily rerouted via Fairbanks, Columbus, Southwater, and Michigan, due to bridge lift at Michigan/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Fairbanks, Columbus, Southwater, and Michigan, due to bridge lift at Michigan/Wacker.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive & #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: #3 & #151 buses temp. rerouted NB via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio & Michigan; SB via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a bridge lift at Michigan/Wacker.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, and Ohio, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, and Wacker, then resume their normal on Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Cullerton
ShortDescription: #49 buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Cermak, Damen, 18th, and Western, due to an accident near Western/Cullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Cermak, Damen, 18th, and Western, due to an accident near Western/Cullerton.

Allow extra travel time.
